body_html:
I had a dirty worktree from trying a few things. Here is the correct diff (against master) which makes it work for me:

--- a/tensorflow/tools/docker/Dockerfile.devel-gpu
+++ b/tensorflow/tools/docker/Dockerfile.devel-gpu
@@ -89,6 +89,7 @@ WORKDIR /tensorflow

 # Configure the build for our CUDA configuration.
 ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH /usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
+ENV CUDNN_INSTALL_PATH /usr/local/cuda
 ENV TF_NEED_CUDA 1
 ENV TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES=3.0,3.5,5.2

@@ -107,4 +108,13 @@ EXPOSE 6006
